        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Creates a clone of this Notifier.

        The clone will contain a new empty listeners list and is independent from this object.

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(Entity entity)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Adds a new children entity.
        This does not update the parent of the given entity.

        Note: You should not need to call this method, instead use setParent(Entity).

        Specified by:
        addEntity in interface Entity

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity(Entity entity)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Search for the given children entity and removes it.
        This does not update the parent property of the entity.

        Note: You should not need to call this method, instead use setParent(Entity) with null parameter.

        Specified by:
        removeEntity in interface Entity

      • getParent

        public Entity getParent()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns the parent of this entity, or null if no parent is set
        Specified by:
        getParent in interface Entity
        Returns:
        the parent of this entity, or null

      • setParent

        public void setParent(Entity parent)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Updates the parent of this entity.
        This method makes sure that the old and the new parent keep their entities list updated, by automatically calling Entity.addEntity(Entity) and Entity.removeEntity(Entity).

        A CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_PARENT_CHANGED notification is thrown.
        Additionally, each descendant of this entity (ie: entities who have this entity as their direct or not direct parent) are notified using CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_ANCESTOR_CHANGED.

        Specified by:
        setParent in interface Entity

      • hasParentRec

        public boolean hasParentRec()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns true if this entity has a parent (different from null) and calling Entity.hasParentRec() on the parent of this entity also returns true.
        Specified by:
        hasParentRec in interface Entity
        Returns:
        true if this entity and each of its parents has a non null parent

      • lockParent

        public void lockParent()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Increments the parent lock, and will prevent parent change until Entity.unlockParent() is called.

        This method is useful if you need to prevent erroneous parent changes during specific moments of the simulation.

        You need to call Entity.unlockParent() at least the same times as you called Entity.lockParent() to be able to change the parent again.

        Specified by:
        lockParent in interface Entity

      • unlockParent

        public void unlockParent()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Decrements the parent lock.

        You need to call Entity.unlockParent() at least the same times as you called Entity.lockParent() to be able to change the parent.

        Specified by:
        unlockParent in interface Entity

      • lockParentRec

        public void lockParentRec()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Calls Entity.lockParent() on this entity, and then calls Entity.lockParentRec() on the parent of this entity if it is set.
        Specified by:
        lockParentRec in interface Entity

      • unlockParentRec

        public void unlockParentRec()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Calls Entity.unlockParent() on this entity, and then calls Entity.unlockParentRec() on the parent of this entity if it is set.
        Specified by:
        unlockParentRec in interface Entity

      • getConfig

        public Config getConfig()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns this entity's configuration as set using Entity.setConfig(Config), or null.

        This method may return null if no configuration was set for this Entity.

        Note: a configuration may be shared between more than one entity, use properties (Entity.setProperty(Object, Object)), if you want to set data for this sole instance.

        Specified by:
        getConfig in interface Entity
        Returns:
        this entity's configuration or null if none is set
        See Also:
        Entity.getConfigRec()

      • getConfigRec

        public Config getConfigRec()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns a not null configuration for this entity.

        This method first tries to return this entity's configuration if it is set (ie: not null).

        If this entity has a null configuration, then this method returns the parent's configuration by calling Entity.getConfigRec() on the parent of this entity.

        If this entity has a null configuration and a null parent, then the simulator's configuration is returned.

        Unlike Entity.getConfig(), this method should not return null.

        Specified by:
        getConfigRec in interface Entity
        Returns:
        a not null configuration for this entity

        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Updates this entity's configuration.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        config - new configuration

      • getLogger

        public Logger getLogger()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns a Logger instance for this Entity.

        Default is to return the logger of the parent of this entity.

        If this entity has a null parent, then Logger.getGlobal() is returned.

        Specified by:
        getLogger in interface Entity
        Returns:
        a Logger instance for this Entity
